td.h3: School is closed for the remainder of the 2019-2020 school year
td.p:
April 16, 2020
School Closure 2019-2020
School Closure 2019-2020-Arabic
School Closure 2019-2020-Spanish

March 20, 2020
Spring Break Information

Spring Break Information - Spanish

March 18, 2020
Yesterday, Governor Evers announced that all K-12 schools will be closed until further notice. This LINK outlines the district's next steps. Please read the letter carefully.
Thank you.
